body_text: How can the man in the back see? In the back of this screenshot from Naruto episode 80 (during the Third Hokage's funeral), circled, is a man with his face entirely covered by bandages. Is it known how he can see?

Chunin exam arc instructor with full head bandage I was re-watching all the Naruto episodes and in ep 24 of Chunin exam arc, there are several instructors who are watching over genins who are trying to cheat.
One of them hits a genin when he's caught and denies his act. This instructor has full bandage almost covering his eyes too.
Does anyone remember if he's ever shown again or can identify him?
